name: Epic.Weapon_Mastery_Stalker
display_help: Devices are equipment you have constructed for use in combat. By using them strategically, you can gain a great tactical advantage. Traps, non-lethal munitions, and demolitions are available in this power set.

powers.name: Epic.Weapon_Mastery_Stalker.Web_Grenade
powers.display_help: Upon impact, the Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -40.00% strength to recharge for 15s on target
-40.00% run speed, fly speed for 15s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 15s on target

powers.name: Epic.Weapon_Mastery_Stalker.Caltrops
powers.display_help: By achieving perfect harmony of body, mind and spirit you are able to regenerate health and endurance slightly faster than normal. This power is always active and consumes no endurance. You must be level 41 and have Conserve Power or Focused Accuracy before selecting this power.

powers.name: Epic.Weapon_Mastery_Stalker.Shuriken
powers.display_help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast rate of fire. You must be level 41 and have Web Grenade or Physical Perfection before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: Only if hidden or target placated
20.00% chance for 78.36 lethal damage on target
Only against held or sleeping targets when not hidden
7.00% chance for 46.71 lethal damage on target
Only if hidden or target placated

powers.name: Epic.Weapon_Mastery_Stalker.Targeting_Drone
powers.display_help: When this device is activated, the small Targeting Drone hovers around your head and emits targeting laser sights. The lasers can dramatically improve your chance to hit and increase your perception, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Targeting Drone also grants you resistance to powers that debuff your chance to hit. This is a toggle power and must be activated and deactivated manually. Like all toggle powers, Targeting Drone costs endurance while active. You must be level 41 and have Web Grenade or Physical Perfection before selecting this power. Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +To Hit, +ACC, +Perception, Res(DeBuff To Hit)

powers.name: Epic.Weapon_Mastery_Stalker.Exploding_Shuriken
powers.display_help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. You must be level 44 and have two other Weapon Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
